update bwt_connector_alone_price
alonegoodsykgprice = #{alonegoodsykgprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
alonegoodsykg = #{alonegoodsykg,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
aloneoverload = #{aloneoverload,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
alonepacking = #{alonepacking,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addressid = #{addressid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where aloneprice = #{aloneprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bwt_connector_alone_price set alonegoodsykgprice = #{alonegoodsykgprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, alonegoodsykg = #{alonegoodsykg,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, aloneoverload = #{aloneoverload,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, alonepacking = #{alonepacking,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addressid = #{addressid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where aloneprice = #{aloneprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from bwt_connector_alone_price p where p.addressid = ${addressid}
SELECT areaname FROM `bwt_alone_middle_area` m LEFT JOIN `pb_area` a ON (m.`id` = a.`id`) WHERE m.aloneprice = ${aloneprice}
